title: Europe will do just fine with fewer American troops, says top US NATO general
description: Gen. Alexus Grynkewich's comments come as European countries worry about the reliability of their alliance with the U.S.
content: There's always rebalancing amongst the positions that different nations fill across the alliance, Grynkewich said, adding that it's natural that some of that will happen over the course of the next s… [+1253 chars]
